class.name: PIXI.PixelateFilter
class.help: This filter applies a pixelate effect making display objects appear 'blocky'.

public.name: syncUniforms
public.help: Syncs the uniforms between the class object and the shaders.

public.name: size
public.help: This a point that describes the size of the blocks. x is the width of the block and y is the height.
